ComicInfo.Summary:
Taxi Terrors: Cab drivers Heckle and Jeckle take Dimwit and Chesty on the taxi-ride from... heck.
The Mystery Train: The Claw and his gang are robbing mouse-operated passenger trains, plundering valuables and taking prisoners to work in the salt mines. With the aid of Professor Ohm's super magnet attached to a helicopter, the cats are able to lift entire train cars full of mice, and deposit them with the fortified walls of Claw Territory.
The Last Roundup: Cats unleash trained hawks on two unsuspecting squirrels and Mighty Mouse.
The Sphinx Strikes Again: The Sphinx, a Boris Karloff-like mouse with hypnotic powers, escapes from prison with his lackeys in tow to make more trouble for Mighty Mouse.
Two of a Kind: The Claw confounds both Mighty Mouse and the Terrytown police with Professor Ohm's "optical confusion machine"... but not for long.
Assignment Uranus: Mighty Mouse is called upon to escort a space ship set to pass close to Uranus, where other ships have vanished. Along the way, he vanquishes a band of Martian pirates and tows the ship to a refueling station before falling victim to "guided cyclones" directed toward him and the ship by hostile forces on Uranus.
A Private Affair: Sourpuss becomes a peeping-tom using Gandy's telescope.
Amateur Magician: Little Roquefort wants to be Percy's assistant for a magician's contest. When denied and shaken-up in a milk bottle for his troubles, he stows away to sabotage the act.
Dinky and His Lady Bug: Rudy is both annoyed by and jealous of Dinky's friendship with a lady bug.
Cat Attractor: Little Roquefort foils Percy with a slingshot and a magnet.
Reverse Prank: Sourpuss' prank on Gandy backfires.
A Mouse in the House: The titular "Mouse in the House" unnerves the Bear Family into several pages of unbridled histrionics on the part of all, before he is finally trapped and asked to leave. As the mouse walks off, insulted over being unwelcome, he says "Good riddance to you too! I think BEARS belong in ZOOS!"
Broadening the Mind: Dimwit tries to show his girl how smart he is... and does just the opposite.
ComicInfo.Tags: Jeckle,Chesty,Gandy Goose,Uranus,Dimwit,Dinky Duck,Mighty Mouse,Heckle,Mitzi Mouse,Sourpuss,Rudy the Rooster,Little Roquefort,Professor Ohm,Terry Bears,Percy Puss,Farmer Al Falfa
